name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Xiangpiaopiao responded to the incident of mocking Japan with its packaging:
"Our employees are great!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 4, at Zhengzhou Hanghai Stadium, Henan football fans collectively raised black plastic bags to protest against the Football Association, and shouted in unison, "The Football Association is stupid."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 5, Hu Xijin wrote an article praising "new social media has returned fairness to Henan people", which was met with Henan bank depositors crying out for justice in the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Shandong Zibo launched the "Artificial Intelligence 5G One-Click Sunscreen Machine" during the May Day holiday:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 5, police and social workers were stationed at every section of the Chongqing Yangtze River Bridge.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 5, employees of the supermarket involved in the "Xiangpiaopiao" incident said that the incident was caused by Xiangpiaopiao employees posing in the store to hype it up. Now the "patriotic traffic" has been taken away by Xiangpiaopiao, but the supermarket has inexplicably taken the blame.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 5, Jiang Jianqi, chairman of Xiangpiaopiao, held up a sign at the airport to welcome back employees who had returned from Japan to pose for photos and hype themselves up.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 4, a witness of the Mei-Da Expressway landslide spoke out and described what happened. Currently, his son is in the ICU, but his wife, mother and mother-in-law have passed away.
He said in the article that because the fallen trams caught fire one after another, the people trapped in the cars could not escape at all. It also caused the people who were unconscious in the car to be swallowed by the fire before they could wait for rescue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 4, Zhengzhou, Henan. It was reported online that a man drowned in public while swimming at Ruihonghong Fitness Swimming Pool.
His sister said: Ten minutes after the drowning man sank to the bottom of the pool, no staff of the venue came to rescue him. It was not until other guests started to rescue him that they followed into the water to rescue him. The family members defended their rights outside the Ruihong Fitness Club that day. The sister also said that her brother was a swimming coach at the venue. He had just had a physical examination this year and was very healthy. There was no history of contagious diseases in the family.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 5, a fire broke out in the Sijiqing Suhang Clothing Market in Hangzhou, Zhejiang. According to official reports, the suspect He Mouqiang set fire to clothing at a stall on the second floor of the clothing market, then jumped from the sixth floor of a nearby market. The fire was extinguished immediately and no casualties were caused. The suspect He Mouqiang died after failed rescue efforts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 3, according to China Business News, the ticket prices of the four high-speed railways, Wuhan-Guangzhou High-speed Railway, Shanghai-Hangzhou Passenger Railway, Shanghai-Kunming Passenger Railway, and Hangzhou-Ningbo Passenger Railway, will start to increase in June, with an increase of nearly 20%, which is the largest increase in high-speed railway ticket prices in recent years.
Starting from June 15, 2024, the Wuhan-Guangzhou High-speed Railway will increase the ticket prices of EMU trains with a speed of 300 kilometers per hour or above running on the Wuhan-Guangzhou section of the Beijing-Guangzhou High-speed Railway, and the full-trip ticket price will increase by about 20%.
The Shanghai-Hangzhou Passenger Railway will increase the current 73 yuan second-class seat ticket price from Shanghai Hongqiao to Hangzhou East to 87 yuan, an increase of 19.18%, and the Hangzhou-Ningbo Passenger Railway will increase the current 71 yuan second-class seat ticket price from Hangzhou East to Ningbo to 85 yuan, an increase of 19.72%.
Many netizens expressed their dissatisfaction in the comment area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the Chutianyufu Group B community in Kaifu District, Changsha City, Hunan Province, the developer decorated the overhead floor with double standards and illegally collected property fees. The owners went to the marketing center to defend their rights. The developer's security guards clashed with the owners and violently snatched the banners.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: China Post’s new portrait law states:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 5, Baotou, Inner Mongolia. China Railway Feibao Express (Inner Mongolia) International Logistics Co., Ltd. owes wages to truck drivers. Drivers hold banners to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 5, Z-Library Official changed its name and wrote a long article in its personal name, blaming me for Z-Library's withdrawal from China. It was very humorous. (But I didn't expect that someone who dared to openly operate Z-Library in China with a lot of anti-communist content would not even dare to type Chinese characters.)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The article has been deleted.
In the latest Weibo post, the person concerned hopes that his "nephew" can be safe and healthy.
